name: Super Dungeon Run
description: Super Dungeon Run is a fast paced, addictive action game in which you guide a party of hapless heroes on a quest for loot in the depths of a dark and dangerous dungeon!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista SP2 or newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Intel or AMD dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 8800 or ATI 2900 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: - Minimum specs preliminary
